position: Culture & Transformation | Employer Branding & Engagement | Talent Acquisition | Daraz (Alibaba Group) | X Retailo

experience.title: Human Resources Executive
experience.description: - Responsible for complete recruitment cycle. understanding the requisition, drafting job   descriptions, advertising jobs, sourcing and screening incumbents, interviewing shortlisted applicants and on-boarding the finalized candidate.-Coordinating with business managers- understanding and efficiently meeting the requirements of each hiring manager. -Attracting potential employees through a range of means- such as through social media advertising and networking.-Developing, coordinating and implementing selection and recruitment related policies and procedures.-Proposing, designing and improving Fresh graduate recruitment programs like Graduate Trainees. Coordination with ‘career placement officers’ of universities to build positive image of company to attract fresh candidates and ensuring Team Reactivate brand presence. - Serving as a first point-of-contact for employee questions on HR policies and/or processes and maintaining a high-quality, timely, and professional service until each case is fully resolved.-Contributing to the implementation and accomplishment of Human Resource practices by staying updated on various HR processes to answer employee queries.-Partnered with varied stakeholders to conduct investigations, provide counsel, and facilitate prompt, fair, and effective resolution of concerns to foster a positive employee experience.-Helped in developing and building the people culture and strategy of Team Reactivate based on consultation with the People team, as well as the management team.
experience.description_html: - Responsible for complete recruitment cycle. understanding the requisition, drafting job  descriptions, advertising jobs, sourcing and screening incumbents, interviewing shortlisted applicants and on-boarding the finalized candidate.-Coordinating with business managers- understanding and efficiently meeting the requirements of each hiring manager. -Attracting potential employees through a range of means- such as through social media advertising and networking.-Developing, coordinating and implementing selection and recruitment related policies and procedures.-Proposing, designing and improving Fresh graduate recruitment programs like Graduate Trainees. Coordination with ‘career placement officers’ of universities to build positive image of company to attract fresh candidates and ensuring Team Reactivate brand presence. - Serving as a first point-of-contact for employee questions on HR policies and/or processes and maintaining a high-quality, timely, and professional service until each case is fully resolved.-Contributing to the implementation and accomplishment of Human Resource practices by staying updated on various HR processes to answer employee queries.-Partnered with varied stakeholders to conduct investigations, provide counsel, and facilitate prompt, fair, and effective resolution of concerns to foster a positive employee experience.-Helped in developing and building the people culture and strategy of Team Reactivate based on consultation with the People team, as well as the management team.

experience.title: Human Resources Intern
experience.description: - Carried out the onboarding process and conducted orientation of the new hires.- Worked with the HR operations team and updated employee data.- Helped with daily scheduling, responding to employees' emails, and handled incoming calls.- Managed the attendance and salary cycle.- Employee Grievance Management.- Conducted employee engagement activities.

experience.title: Finance Intern
experience.description: - Assisted the Account Manager in the E-Filling of monthly Sales tax withholding statement in FBR/SRB.- Reviewed the current SOPs of the Finance department and was asked to recommend changes in order to update it.- Managed Invoices to identify the difference between personal and company expenditures carried out by the Executive Team.- Collected and Analyzed Provident Fund data to help in creating bank reconciliation statements.
